title: 04/02/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/02/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the thrill of Major League Baseball’s Opening Day. Dan and the guys recaps some of the many games yesterday as well as some games he tuned into. In the second hour, New York Times Bestselling author Jeff Pearlman joined the show to talk about how his book, “Showtime: Magic, Kareem, Riley, and the Los Angeles Lakers Dynasty of the 1980’s” is getting turned into a series by HBO. Lastly, coming off of a three year extension with ESPN, Dick Vitale joins the show to discuss how the transfer market is ruining college basketball in his eyes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Lastly, coming off of a three year extension with ESPN, Dick Vitale joins the show to discuss how the transfer market is ruining college basketball in his eyes.
